title: Understanding Criteria Range
text: A criteria range is a specific area in a spreadsheet where you define the conditions or criteria that data must meet to be included in a result set.

title: Purpose of Criteria Range
text: The criteria range is used to filter data based on specific conditions, allowing you to extract only the relevant information from a larger dataset.

hintAnswer: a location separate from the table used to list specific search specifications
title: Identifying the Criteria Range
text: Where is the criteria range typically located in relation to the data table?
choices: a location separate from the table used to list specific search specifications
a range to which Excel copies the records that meet the comparison criteria from the criteria ranged
a special use of the search string
